ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 31st day of August, 2012, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, LIMITED TO the issue set forth below. Alocatur is DENIED as to all remaining issues. The issue, as stated by Petitioner, are:
Whether the Superior Court’s interpretation of Pa.R.C.P. No. 4003.3 improperly provides absolute work product protection to all communications between a party’s counsel and their trial expert?
